title: King Arthur's Disasters
overview: King Arthur's Disasters follows the absurd and epic adventures of King Arthur on his various quests to satisfy Princess Guinevere's need for exotic presents, in the vain hope that she will finally agree to marry him.King Arthur's enthusiasm is as limitless as the quests are futile and with his doddery magician Merlin he must confront the likes of cunning pigs, pink knights, blood thirsty squirrels and the inevitable Robin Hood and his not so Merry Men and Women.
